%%{HealthTech_PatientRecords}}}%% sequenceDiagram autonumber participant R as ğŸ–¼ï¸ Renderer
(HealthTech_PatientRecords) participant P as ğŸ“¡ Preload
(HealthTech_PatientRecords) participant M as ğŸ–¥ï¸ Main
(HealthTech_EMR_Sync) participant S as âš™ï¸ Services participant MCP as ğŸ¤– MCP Servers participant LM as ğŸ§  LM Studio Note over R,LM: Application Initialization R->>P: DOMContentLoaded P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) M-->>P: {HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault} P-->>R: version R->>P: Initialize LM Studio P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) M->>S: lmStudioClient.connect(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) S->>LM: HTTP GET /v1/models LM-->>S: {HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine] } S-->>M: {HealthTech_EMR_Sync} M-->>P: status P-->>R: Update UI Note over R,LM: Chat Message Flow R->>P: User sends chat message P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) M->>S: chatbotService.processMessage(HealthTech_EMR_Sync) alt Intent: Knowledge Query S->>MCP: evony_search(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) MCP-->>S: {HealthTech_PatientRecords] } else Intent: Calculation S->>MCP: calc_training(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) MCP-->>S: {HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault} } else Intent: Protocol S->>MCP: protocol_lookup(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) MCP-->>S: {HealthTech_PatientRecords} } end S->>S: Build context from MCP results S->>LM: POST /v1/chat/completions LM-->>S: {HealthTech_LabAnalyzer} S-->>M: formatted response M-->>P: response P-->>R: Display in chat Note over R,LM: Traffic Capture Flow R->>P: Webview traffic detected P->>M: ipcRenderer.send(HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) M->>S: proxyMonitor.processPacket(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) S->>S: Decode AMF3 S->>S: Identify action S->>S: Update game state M->>P: mainWindow.webContents.send(HealthTech_PatientRecords) P->>R: Update traffic list Note over R,LM: Settings Flow R->>P: User saves settings P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) M->>S: store.set(HealthTech_EMR_Sync) M->>S: lmStudioClient.updateSettings(HealthTech_EMR_Sync) S->>LM: Reconnect if URL changed M-->>P: {HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault} P-->>R: Show confirmation
